title: Thunderbird email account
content:
Hey,

I use thunderbird for email purposes and noticed today that I could not send or receive emails. When I go to compose an email it allows me to type email as usual but there is no send button or option to send when I right click the screen. I got someone to send me an email as a test but I did not receive the email. My email address is ianwil@interlog.com.

Please let me know.

Thanks
creator: ianwil62

title: One of my Gmail accounts inside Thunderbird takes forever
content:
One of my six different Gmail accounts that I have active in Thunderbird takes forever to catch up and load up compared to all the rest ... this has been going on for years

The update bar in the lower right will sit there at halfway through for minutes... .

Attach screenshot please look at the bottom right corner also

Thank you for Anybody's help Craig, Seattle

title: Sending .mp4 files with email message
content:
128.6.0esr (64-bit):

Have in the past received occasional e-messages where I needed to go to a file-sharing site to open pix. That is the extent of my understanding of file-sharing, how to file-share my e-message with the .mp4 files attached, etc., etc.

PC here; Windows 10.

So how can I file-share my message with .mp4 attachments?

Thank you. Appreciated.

title: Thunderbird/Ubuntu stops receiving emails from pop yahoo
content:
Hi, 

  Thunderbird on Ubuntu for many years. Started from Ubuntu 20 or so it periodically stops receiving mails from pop yahoo account. Nothing described in community threads helps. It can be for month, two or three, then at some moment it starts receiving emails(nothing changed, even server not restarted, thunderbird keeps hanging not receiving emaiils) and receives for some period(can be couple of days or few weeks). after that it can stop receiving again and it hangs for long.  This situation is for few years for now. last time it stopped receiving emails in mid of December. before this it was working fine for couple of months.   As nothing changes on my side I assume issue is on yahoo?

current release: Ubuntu 24.04.1 LTS 128.6.0esr (64-bit) 

 When not receiving emails I can see following in error log:

op3.server2.1: NetworkTimeoutError: a Network error occurred Pop3Client.sys.mjs:380:18 

   _onError resource:///modules/Pop3Client.sys.mjs:380

pop3.server2.1: SecurityError info: Pop3Client.sys.mjs:422:20 

   _onError resource:///modules/Pop3Client.sys.mjs:422

​
creator: Filmoscope

title: Invio allegati a mail
content: Salve, quando invio una mail con allegato appare questo messaggio: Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Si è verificato un errore durante l’invio della posta. Il server di posta ha risposto: 1k1Y2E00r33c9ka01k1Ywl Spam Detected. Controllare il messaggio e riprovare. Questo avviene dopo un aggiornamento del programma Thunderbird, cosa posso fare per risolvere il problema che si è verificato dopo un aggiornamento? Grazie

title: Přeposílání příloh.
content:
Dobrý den, mám úplně nový pc Lenovo se systémem Windows 11 Home verze 23H2, 64bitový operační systém, procesor pro platformu x64.

Na něm novou instalaci Thunderbirdu 128.6.0esr (64 bitů)

Mail přijímá zprávy s přílohami i textem zprávy v pořádu. Pokud chci zprávu přeposlat nebo na ní odpovědět není v odpovědi obsažen text původní zprávy ani žádná příloha. Nevím jak dál, aby odpověď/přeposlání obdahovaly původní text a původní přílohu? Poradíte? Děkuji.

title: thunderbird crashing
content:
Hi,

Today I got some problems with thunderbird. At first, when opening the program, it opens a new message that mentions "Provider for CalDAV & CardDAV: It's time to go" The message is not complete and has some drawing background I could initially still look at my mails but then tried to remove that mail and then the rogram crashed. I tried going into the accounts setting to update and that would also lead to crashing. I tried to set the troubleshoot mode off but it would crash before I can click to turn it off.

Any assistance would be great I use windows 11, 64 bits the thunderbird version is 128.5.2esr (32 bits)

Thanks a lot!

Vincent
creator: vtihon8

title: Ever since the v128.6.0 arrived , I have had problems replying to emails.
content: Hi all, When I reply to an email after I click send, the email is somehow not sent to where it should be going but comes back to my inbox. If I select that incoming email, go to the Message menu, select Edit as a new message, and just send it straight away, it gets sent to where it should be and is put into the sent box as well. Is there something I've done wrong in the background, or is it a bug. Thanks in advance Steve

title: Incoming email opening
content:
Thunderbird. When I open an incoming email (double click) it goes immediately to single window in compose mode, with my name as sender instead actual senders email address. There is message at bottom “A unique identity matching the From address was not found. The message will be sent using the current field and settings from identity (my name)”

This happened just today (16 jan 2025). Previous email already received and read without any issue, also come up in the compose message mode.

I have win 10 installed on desktop. Thank you Steph
creator: stephlan

title: Darstellung Benutzeroberfläche
content:
Guten Tag

Könnten die Programmierer der Benutzeroberfläche in Thunderbird den Teil, wo "von", "an", "Betreff" und "Antwort an" aufgeführt ist, schmaler gestalten (Zeilen näher zusammen), so dass etwas weniger von der Bildschirmansicht verdeckt wird? In älteren Versionen war das deutlich besser gelöst. Wäre toll, wenn das bei der nächsten Aktualisierung berücksichtigt wird.

Danke, dass sich jemand darum kümmert.

LG, Irène
creator: frei.irene1

title: ImportExportNG Tool, exporting & importing nested folders, mostly does not work, empty or incomplete
content:
Hi,

Not very specific i'm afraid but trying to export all my folders from an old server to new MS 365 emails. All on Thunderbird.

Nested 2 or 3 folders down but seem to be the same on jsut one nest. 15 subfolders with a few others below

either stops with no warning, copys perhaps 50 or soor the occasional error, no info.

Either export direct from inbox, eml with index & subfolders or copied to local first, copy seems fine into local.

If I drag to inbox or copy, again not all move, does this on multiple folders so not as if one is corrupted. Even used remove duplicates to perhaps clean up.

Very vague I know but any idea what I can try.
